doc:
Sylvia Field https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sylvia_Field 0 Sylvia Field (born Harriet Louisa Johnson; February 28, 1901 – July 31, 1998) was an American actress whose career encompassed performances on stage, screen, and TV. She was best known for playing the understanding Mrs. Martha Wilson (Mr. Wilson's wife) on the television sitcom Dennis the Menace on CBS from 1959 to 1962. Sylvia_Field ( born Harriet_Louisa_Johnson ; February_28_,_1901 – July_31_,_1998 ) was an_American_actress whose_career encompassed performances on stage , screen , and TV . She was_best_known for playing the_understanding_Mrs._Martha_Wilson ( Mr._Wilson 's_wife ) on the_television_sitcom_Dennis the_Menace on CBS from 1959 to 1962 .
